channel.title: 2 Simple Questions
channel.description:
1) How do I change the teleports, I mean when I teleport to anywhere I get this stuiped tele I want to change.... how can I change it?
2) how can I put any emote i want when you die....?

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @spy_man47 spy man47
item.description:
@spy_man47 wrote:

Sirpali, Thank you so much!

Ohnoes, Thank you very much!

Rep++ for both of you, but I will repo sirlpali today and Ohnoes tomorrow (:!

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @dannydude8 dannydude8
item.description:
@dannydude8 wrote:

If you want the to change the teleport locations let say home. You would do ::home and it would tele you to home dont move grab the coords of that location then go into client.java and search for those coords do CTRL + F and type in coords and change them.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @QuestMaster_2K10 QuestMaster 2K10
item.description:
@QuestMaster_2K10 wrote:

Change the co-ordinations to which is inside the teleporting method that you are using, then use ::Mypos to find the Co-ords that you are currently at on. Take the Co-ordinates that you it tells you, and place it within the teleport method.

Example:

0000, 0000, 0 - Example format of coorinates.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“Oh-Noes, post:6, topic:329088”]Oh right, search for:

tStage = 2

All the GFX and emote codes related to teleporting are within that area. Might be different depending on your source though :/[/quote]

Ah thanks, also found it myself now

Find

if (tStage == 1 && tTime == 0) {

Below it should be

			setAnimation(1979); // Barage emote
			lowGFX(392, 0); // Ancient teleport graphics

Change those emotes to whatever you please.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions

item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

I think he is talking about the teleport animation, not the teleport locations…

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

1.) for the teleport problem try this:

  • logon the server with a owner account
    – teleport with the tab or whatever you use
    — use the command ::mypos to find the coords
    ---- type the coords in the search box and then replace them
    ----- once you replace the coords with your prefered code save
    ------ compile your server and see if the updates made were perfect
    ------- if they were complete then goodjob and nice working with you

enjoy

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

For teleports, just use mypos to find where they currently teleport you to, and then find those coordinates and change them.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

For the tele, I don’t know yet, trying to find that one out myself.

The deathemote I did find though.

Open client.java and find

if (deathStage == 1) {
A little bit below that, you should find

startAnimation(0x900);

To make it easy, delete that part, and add

pEmote = ***;

Save, compile, Enjoy!

Read full topic
